title: Red Panda Fun Facts
author: OrangeConcrete
pages:
Red Panda Fun Facts!

-------------------

1. They are classified
as small mammals, and
are a little bigger
than a domestic cat.
They have a
red-brown fur, long,
bushy tail, and a
masked face, which
makes it a very cute
animal :) ------->

2. Yet another
endagered animal, with
many of the same
reasons as the other
animals in this zoo.

3. They are mostly a
solitary animal, and
are active during
dawn and dusk.
